description: The Silver Oak Mazingira focuses on planting indigenous trees in urban areas to enhance the environment and biodiversity. Collaborating with community-based organization founded by university students, they have planted over 600 trees of more than 60 species in a small urban space. The project aims to educate children about environmental stewardship and the importance of indigenous trees, which support local ecosystems, attract pollinators, and contribute to sustainable food systems.
name: Silver Oak Mazingira
